name: 4MN-3514
description:
Story :

While 4MN-3514, a simple maintenance robot in a high tech company, was on standby to charge its batteries, the whole world witnessed what seems to be the end of the world. 

Some specialists even claim that the time itself collapsed, in these conditions the government dispatched the army in order to evacuate the survivors from the most unstable zones. 

It is in these conditions that 4MN-3514 reactivates itself, it learned the situation by the means of Internet but the evacuation ship is about to leave and our robot realizes that its program has been corrupted by the evenements, it can only walk to the right. 

He needs to find his modules of movement in order to join the ship in the top of the city tower and evacuate as soon as possible! But 4MN-3514 will need to find them through various stages affected by the cataclysm.

Controls :

Q -> Go left

D -> Go right

Spacebar -> Jump
